Northland residents fear changes to Hokianga St John ambulance services will impact patients https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-residents-fear-changes-to-hokianga-st-john-ambulance-services-will-impact-病人/7OAI7Y3NQBGGFBMDW62UJKEWYQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-residents-fear-changes-to-hokianga-st-john-ambulance-services-will-impact-病人/7OAI7Y3NQBGGFBMDW62UJKEWYQ/ Jenny LingHokianga residents are concerned about changes to the Rawene St John ambulance station. Sun, 14 Jul 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Hokianga residents are riled up that St John is replacing a fully functional ambulance with a smaller Volkswagen first response unit.
Weather: Heavy rain warnings for northern NZ; rare polar phenomenon could mean stormy conditions in weeks ahead https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-heavy-rain-warnings-for-northern-nz-tomorrow-rare-polar-phenomenon-could-mean-stormy-conditions-in-weeks-ahead/ IP5FRY677ZADRFJIZELPOE6TXU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-heavy-rain-warnings-for-northern-nz-tomorrow-rare-polar-phenomenon-could-mean-stormy-conditions-in-weeks-ahead/ IP5FRY677ZADRFJIZELPOE6TXU/ Jamie MortonPeople across the upper North Island are being told to brace for severe weather. Sun, 14 Jul 2024 04:07:51 +0000 Every winter, the polar vortex forms high above Antarctica in the polar stratosphere. This year, the vortex is showing signs of being disturbed.

Kids in deprived neighbourhoods exposed to dirtier air, NZ-first analysis shows https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kids-in-deprived-neighbourhoods-expose-to-dirtier-air-nz-first-analysis-shows/PKIDTX3WBRAPNI7AXXJ3QA2NDE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kids-in-deprived-neighbourhoods-expose-to-dirtier-air-nz-first-analysis-shows/PKIDTX3WBRAPNI7AXXJ3QA2NDE/ Jamie MortonChildren born in deprived neighbourhoods exposed to dirtier air, new analysis finds. Donald Trump shooting: NZ political leaders condemn ‘political violence’ following rally attack https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/donald-trump-shooting-nz-political-leaders-condemn-political-violence-following-rally-attack/DJGVPFQXMBC2ZAADMCWHPRTHR4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/donald-trump-shooting-nz-political-leaders-condemn-political-violence-following-rally-attack/DJGVPFQXMBC2ZAADMCWHPRTHR4/ Adam PearseLuxon, Seymour and Hipkins have all released similar statements, condemning the shooting. Kāinga Ora: Housing Minister Chris Bishop expects evictions to rise in crackdown on unruly tenants https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kainga-ora-housing-minister-chris-bishop-expects-evictions-to-rise-in-crackdown-on-unruly-tenants/FEKAECX4UNAB5DGQ7N6TWPE2YY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kainga-ora-housing-minister-chris-bishop-expects-evictions-to-rise-in-crackdown-on-unruly-tenants/FEKAECX4UNAB5DGQ7N6TWPE2YY/ The Housing Minister expects the housing agency to evict an increasing number of people. Sun, 14 Jul 2024 00:12:55 +0000 Housing completed recently in Kelvin Pl, Maraenui, similar to some of the homes being developed by Government agency Kainga Ora Homes and Communities across three Napier suburbs over the next 18 months to two years.
Colin Hoani says he has learned patience after stabbing neighbour Valmai McFie to death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/colin-hoani-has-learned-patience-after-stabbing-neighbour-valmai-mcfie-to-death/D7QU4NY6TJHBBDROPMVADE7OZY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/colin-hoani-has-learned-patience-after-stabbing-neighbour-valmai-mcfie-to-death/D7QU4NY6TJHBBDROPMVADE7OZY/ Jeremy Wilkinson“They say you can’t teach an old dog new tricks, perhaps that’s not true.” Sun, 14 Jul 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Colin Hoani in the dock at the Christchurch High Court in 2013.
